type.en: Course with defence at the end

description.en: The MSc thesis is an independent written work that is based on an experimental and theoretical scientific research.
description.et: Magistritöö on eksperimentaalse ja teoreetilise teadusliku uurimuse põhjal koostatud iseseisev kirjalik töö.

objectives.en: There will be created conditions that are needed for understanding specifics of the research in a certain speciality, for carrying out research work, and for presenting results.
objectives.et: Luuakse tingimused ülevaate saamiseks erialase uurimistöö spetsiifikast ning vastavasisulise uurimistöö läbiviimisest ja tulemuste esitamisest.

learning_outcomes.en: As a result of the defence the student:

1) can apply acquired knowledge in formulating scientific problems, in planning and conducting research, in making conclusions based on collected data, and in presenting results in written and oral form,
learning_outcomes.et: 1) oskab rakendada omandatud teadmisi teadusprobleemide sõnastamisel, vastavate uuringute planeerimisel ja läbiviimisel, kogutud andmete põhjal järelduste tegemisel ning nende kirjalikul ja suulisel esitamisel;

learning_outcomes.en: 2) is able to find and analyse scientific information and can synthesise new knowledge for the speciality based on the previously available and collected scientific data,
learning_outcomes.et: 2) oskab leida ja analüüsida teaduslikku infot ning suudab sellest ja enda poolt kogutud teaduslikest andmetest sünteesida uusi erialaseid teadmisi;

learning_outcomes.en: 3) have skills for composing and conducting a presentation in public and to express himself/herself in his/her speciality in written and oral form and to defend his/her thoughts,
learning_outcomes.et: 3) oskab koostada ja pidada avalikku ettekannet ning end väljendada oma erialal nii suuliselt kui ka kirjalikult ja kaitsta oma seisukohti;

learning_outcomes.en: 4) understands the basic principles of ethics of science and is able to evaluate scientific value and applicability of studies in his/her speciality.
learning_outcomes.et: 4) tunneb teaduseetika üldprintsiipe ning oskab hinnata oma valdkonna uuringute teaduslikku taset ja rakenduslikku väärtust.

notes.en:
The deadline for submitting Master's theses is 23.12.2024 at 23.59
The thesis is submitted in the course's moodle environment: https://moodle.ut.ee/course/view.php?id=5637
The thesis file must be submitted digitally signed in PDF format with the necessary license.
With the thesis, the supervisor's opinion must be submitted digitally signed in PDF format as well as in moodle.
Thesis defenses will take place in January 14 2025 9-17, at the UT Institute of Technology, room 121 (Nooruse 1, Tartu 50411, 1st floor).

https://tuit.ut.ee/en/content/graduation-thesis-defence

assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)
